title: Arnesh Kumar v. State of Bihar
snippet: The Court directed strict compliance with Section 41 and 41A CrPC safeguards to prevent unnecessary arrests.

title: State of Haryana v. Bhajan Lal
snippet: The judgment outlines categories where criminal proceedings may be quashed to prevent abuse of process.

title: K. Chinnaswamy Reddy v. State of Andhra Pradesh
snippet: Revisional jurisdiction is to be exercised sparingly to cure grave miscarriage of justice.

title: Sharad Birdhichand Sarda v. State of Maharashtra
snippet: Circumstantial evidence must be fully established and consistent only with the guilt of the accused.
